title: If anybody has a Logitech device and experience bugsplats at the start of the game
body:
Make 2 empty DLL files (notepad works, just make sure you are saving them as a .dll) and replace LogitechGkey.dll and LogitechLed.dll with the empty files in "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client\releases\0.0.1.8\deploy".

This will completely eliminate your bugsplats :)
